extDescription.message: Detector of fake sites to retrieve passwords - Protects you from phishing attacks in real-time

doNotEnterPassword.message: This site has been marked as dangerous. DO NOT enter your password!

clickedLinkFrom.message: You clicked a link from "$SOURCE$" (trusted) to this unknown site which is now asking for your password. This is a common phishing pattern!

suspiciousNavigation.message: Suspicious navigation pattern detected. Verify this is a legitimate site!

unverifiedSiteMessage.message: This site is asking for a password but is not in your trusted list. Verify this is legitimate before entering credentials.

confirmDismissWarning.message:
Are you sure you want to dismiss this warning?

This site has been identified as potentially dangerous.

rtpsWarningFocus.message:
RTPS WARNING: This appears to be a phishing site!

DO NOT enter your password.

If you believe this is a legitimate site, you can add it to your trusted list in the RTPS extension.

notifDangerMessage.message:
You navigated from $SOURCE$ to $DEST$ which is marked as UNSAFE!
DO NOT enter any credentials!

notifPhishingMessage.message:
You $METHOD$ from $SOURCE$ and now $DEST$ is asking for your password.
Verify this is a legitimate site!
